description:
TPI, founded in 2017, has built and beta tested a blockchain-powered forex platform, offering innovative exchange and money transfer services between fiat and cryptocurrencies. TPI has come a long way in a short time, ranking now in Top 20 of the 100 Most Influential Blockchain Companies Worldwide.

Our team is comprised of the best, brightest and most passionate people in the industry sharing the same vision of making blockchain application simple and accessible for the masses. Our team have more than 100+ Years of Payments and banking experience which includes executives from Fortune 100 technology companies, central bank and top academic institution.
name: The International Payment
